title: SDE-3 Frontend
description:
**Software Engineer \\- Frontend**
**Role: SDE\\-3**
**Location: Bangalore**
**About ANAROCK And MyHQ**
 At myHQ, we’re reimagining how India works. We are building India’s largest marketplace platform for flexible workspaces helping individuals and teams across 20\\+ cities find workspaces that just work.
   

  

 We’re a small, product\\-first team backed by ANAROCK, moving fast and solving real engineering problems at scale. This is where you’ll get to own systems end\\-to\\-end, not just push tickets.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We’re looking for a Senior Frontend Engineer (SDE\\-3\\) who can combine hands\\-on engineering with technical leadership. Someone who enjoys building, scaling, and securing frontend systems from the ground up while guiding a small team to do the same.
   

  

 This role goes beyond feature delivery — you’ll manage infra, shape engineering practices, and set the direction for how we scale our products. Perfect for someone who’s a builder at heart, excited by tough problems, and comfortable working in an early\\-stage startup environment.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Own frontend architecture end\\-to\\-end: design, build, and scale systems that power critical user\\-facing flows.
* Go deep into performance and infra: optimize bundles, Core Web Vitals, caching, and monitoring at scale.
* Define engineering practices: CI/CD pipelines, testing frameworks, observability, and security standards for frontend.
* Operate like an owner: manage infra pieces (cloud\\-native setups, deployments, monitoring tools) where frontend needs to tie into platform reliability.
* Collaborate closely with backend and product to solve cross\\-cutting problems (latency, API contracts, data flows).
* Mentor and lead engineers in the team, raising the engineering bar through design/code reviews and technical strategy.
* Balance short\\-term delivery with long\\-term scalability, helping the team ship fast without compromising architecture.


**Desired Skills/ Experience**
* 5–8 years building production\\-grade frontend applications at scale.
* Expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and at least one modern framework (React/Angular).
* Strong grasp of frontend architecture patterns, state management, and performance tuning.
* Experience working with CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and cloud\\-native environments
* Prior experience in early\\-stage teams or building products from scratch.


**Nice to have**
* Experience with SEO and PWA
* Built products from scratch or previous experience at working at a start\\-up
* Ability to mentor engineers and drive technical decision\\-making.
* A history of working on side/hobby projects and contributing to open source projects


**People \\& Culture**
* Freedom to execute, an open culture with passionate and smart co\\-workers
* Performance oriented team driven by ownership and open to experimentation
* Lean, fast\\-moving team where engineers own critical systems end\\-to\\-end.


**Other Perks / Benefits**
* Comprehensive term and health insurance for you and your dependents
* Paid maternity / paternity leave to let you spend valuable time with your loved ones


**Frequently Asked Questions**
**What’s the interview process like?**
 The interview process consists of 3\\-4 rounds of technical discussion of 60 mins each and a 30 min cultural fitment discussion. The technical discussion rounds cover past projects, programming basics, DS / Algo and system design. This is followed by a 30 min cultural fitment round.
   

  

**What’s the technical stack that you’re working on?**
 Our tech stack is built on NodeJS, Angular, React, Redis and MongoDB. We are tech stack agnostic when it comes to hiring.

description:
Job Role:
 **Software Quality Assurance Engineer (WFH)**

 The Software Quality Assurance Engineer is responsible for executing test plans, validating system functionality, and ensuring product quality across SAP Business One, web applications, and related systems. The role collaborates with developers, product teams, and QAs to identify defects, perform end\\-to\\-end testing, and support continuous improvement in Agile projects.
 



  





**Desired Qualifications:**




 • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or a related field.
 



 • Minimum of five (5\\) years of software testing or QA experience.
 



 • Must have stable employment history.
 



 • Experience using test management tools to create and document test cases and defect reports.
 



 • Experience using web service testing using tools such as Postman.
 



 • Experience testing SAP Business One or similar ERP systems.
 



 • Applies SQL for database validation and backend testing.
 



 • Demonstrates strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and quality\\-driven skills.
 



 • Communicates clearly in Agile ceremonies and collaborates with technical teams effectively.
